medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and grey wash

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Plans and Elevations for a Neoclassical Triumphal Arch (Project submitted for entry to Accademia di San Luca, Rome)", May 27, 1795.
May 27, 1795. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and grey wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-271.
